description.value: Location where service was provided for reporting laboratory identification of MDRO or CDI in LTCF to NHSN. The latest version of this value set is located at: [NHSN Primary Resident Service Type [2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.5.1.5.9.3]](https://vsac.nlm.nih.gov/valueset/2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.5.1.5.9.3/expansion/Latest).
